reviews.text: Cask.Straw yellow, solid white head.Fruits, bread, cereal smell.Taste: light fruits, biscuits, cereal. More of a body and less bland than the Windemere. Excellent blonde.
Pretty bland, similar to Wild River. Light on everything with very little aroma or flavor.
Bland flavor with no discernible beer style to match. Stay away from it if there are other choices.---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
